content.prompt: Dr. Jamal is designing research to study narcissistic personality disorder. Which of the following should Dr. Jamal make certain to do to adhere to ethical research guidelines?

choices.label: Read the existing research to make sure no other researcher has conducted this type of study.
Discuss the study with other researchers in the field.
Obtain informed consent from the participants prior to conducting the study.
Locate and reserve lab space, hire assistants and order any necessary equipment.

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
